description:
Position: Machine Learning Engineer

Location: San Francisco, CA

Salary: $220k - $270k

Signify is pleased to be searching for a skilled machine learning engineer for our client, a dynamic FinTech company at the forefront of innovation in the financial sector. With a focus on pioneering solutions and a commitment to excellence, they are revolutionizing the way financial services are delivered and experienced. Through a culture of innovation and collaboration, they are driving positive change and reshaping the future of finance.

As a machine learning engineer, they are looking for people with experience in:
• Proficiency in Python and C++ for developing robust and scalable financial applications.
• Experience with PyTorch and TensorFlow for building advanced machine learning models that drive intelligent decision-making.
• Expertise in Natural Language Processing (NLP) to extract valuable insights from financial texts and documents.
• Familiarity with ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) processes for efficiently handling and analyzing vast volumes of financial data.
• Knowledge of Large Language Models (LLM) to enhance the accuracy and efficiency of our financial services.

Responsibilities:

Want to know what the day-to-day looks like as a machine learning engineer for our client? You will be:
• Developing and implementing cutting-edge machine learning algorithms to optimize financial operations and enhance customer experiences.
• Leveraging NLP techniques to extract meaningful information from financial documents and news articles, aiding in investment decisions and risk management.
• Collaborating with cross-functional teams to design and implement ETL pipelines that ensure the reliability and accessibility of our financial data.
• Contributing to the development of large-scale language models to automate and streamline various financial processes, from customer support to fraud detection.
• Staying up-to-date with the latest advancements in AI and machine learning, and proactively applying them to solve complex financial challenges.

Benefits:

Not only will you be working alongside some of the most advanced machine learning engineer in the industry, but you will also receive:
• Generous PTO allowance, along with company holidays and wellness days.
• Matched 401(k) contributions.
• A bonus dependent on company performance.
• Health, Life, and Vision coverage.
• Hybrid working (2 days onsite per week) and flexible working hours.
• Flat hierarchy type leadership allowing for true collaboration of ideas.
• Gym membership discounts and other wellness benefits.
• A Dog-friendly office.

Join their mission to transform the financial landscape and unlock new opportunities for their customers, and grow your experience as a machine learning engineer to new heights!

We make an active choice to be inclusive towards everyone every day. Let us know if you have any accessibility requirements or would like to apply for this role another way by emailing: george.ethell@signify-tech.com
